verbs.description: [ARG1: Apple 's Airpods] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: perfect] , but their convenience trumps the less - than - perfect battery life and audio quality .
Apple 's Airpods are n't perfect , but [ARG0: their convenience] [V: trumps] [ARG1: the less - than - perfect battery life and audio quality] .
